Control Name: 5.9.2 There are controls in place to ensure that security extends past the network boundaries of the workload in order to effectively prevent, detect, and respond to threats.
Control Statement: Traditional network controls based on a 'trusted intranet' approach will not be able to effectively provide security assurances for cloud applications.
